snippet.title: Formula Karts (PC) - Full Championship (Pro Difficulty)
snippet.description:
Released for the Sega Saturn, PS1 & PC in 1997!
To most Sega fans Formula Karts seems to be a big hit or (mostly) miss compared to Sega's other racing offerings. The handling being a big reason for that.
Have those people ever driven a competition go-kart competitively? Because this is some of the closest, most intense racing I've ever had in a video game!

▶ Discord: https://discord.gg/PvVqjr8
▶ Future Playthroughs: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vQ2oidn5bZPoZTmjhEoN7fPTI6f3uibSWndx9XaTjYx-Ar_gtXL9uyje_v0FWT3DKoS5EFixgpXi6T_/pubhtml
